backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing e-commerce functionality with product management, shopping cart, orders, and blob storage mixin; includes migration support and defines Product, Category, CartItem, and Order types.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state to new schema, converting text-based categories to enum variants and adding new fields like videoPreviewUrl, downloadUrl, isMegaBundle, and downloadLinks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including cyberpunk color scheme, hero section updates, search bar addition, category reorganization, and their associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages describing their functionality, styling with cyberpunk theme, and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, cards, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx; sets page title to 'Digital Marketing Shop'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, checkout, order confirmation, and DMCA pages; wraps app in ThemeProvider with dark mode default and includes Toaster.
Reusable button component for adding products to cart with loading, success states, and toast notifications; displays checkmark icon when item is successfully added.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out sheet component displaying cart contents with scrollable item list, total price calculation, and checkout button; shows empty state when cart has no items.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Displays a single cart item with product image, name, price, quantity controls (increment/decrement), and a remove button. Integrates with the cart store to update quantities and remove items.
frontend/src/components/CartSummary.tsx: Shows an order summary card with subtotal, optional tax and shipping, and a total with gradient styling. Accepts props for subtotal, tax, and shipping amounts.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: A form component using react-hook-form for collecting customer contact and address information during checkout. Validates required fields (name and email) and includes optional address fields.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with branding, product/company links, social media icons, DMCA link, and a caffeine.ai attribution. Displays current year and uses gradient styling consistent with the site theme.
frontend/src/components/Hero3D.tsx: Hero section with 3D scene background, collage overlay, and prominent call-to-action promoting 5000+ premium assets. Features gradient text, navigation buttons to products page, and animated sparkle badge.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer. Provides consistent structure across the application.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, product search, navigation links, user icon, and cart button with item count badge. Includes mobile menu drawer and integrates with CartDrawer component.
frontend/src/components/OrderSummary.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of cart items with quantities and prices, plus subtotal, shipping (free), and total. Used in checkout flow to review order before payment.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image/video preview, category badge, name, description, price, and add-to-cart button. Supports hover-triggered video playback and navigation to product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilters.t: Provides filtering UI for products with category dropdown and price range slider. Displays filters in a card layout with neon-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of product cards with loading skeletons and empty state handling. Supports 1-3 column layout based on screen size.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Search input component with debounced search functionality (300ms delay) and search icon. Triggers callback with search term on input change.
frontend/src/components/Scene3D.tsx: Renders an interactive 3D scene using React Three Fiber with floating geometric shapes (sphere, box, torus, octahedron), lighting, and auto-rotating camera controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality. Manages auth client creation, identity persistence, and login status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching products, orders, and download links from the backend actor. Includes mutations for checkout and automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom cyberpunk-themed color palette (neon blue, electric purple, dark charcoal), light/dark mode variables, and neon shadow utilities.
frontend/src/lib/cartStore.ts: Zustand store with persistence for shopping cart state, managing cart items (add, remove, update quantity, clear) and calculating totals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page component that displays a checkout form and order summary, handles order submission via mutation, and redirects to order confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/DMCAPage.tsx: Static informational page displaying DMCA/copyright policy, educational disclaimers, GPL licensing information, and resell rights terms in card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component featuring a 3D hero section, mega bundle promotional card with pricing, and a grid of featured products.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details and download links for purchased digital products using the orderId route parameter.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page showing product information, media preview (image/video), add-to-cart functionality, and frequently bought together recommendations with bundle pricing.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products listing page with search, category filters, price range filtering, and a grid display of filtered products.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining a dark mode theme with custom color palettes (neonBlue, electricPurple, darkCharcoal) using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a digital product marketplace for Instagram Reels and video editing content with 3D rendering, cyberpunk aesthetic, guest checkout, and features including shopping cart, product catalog, payment integration, and mobile-first design.
